ibis.impala.api.ImpalaClient.get_schema¶

ImpalaClient.get_schema(table_name, database=None)¶

Return a Schema object for the indicated table and database

Parameters:

table_name : string

May be fully qualified

database : string, default None
Returns:

schema : ibis Schema
